name: Andrélon Pro nature shampoo shea SOS repair
composition: Ingrediënten: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Parfum, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Sheaboter), Cocos Nucifera Oil (Kokosolie), Glycol Distearate, Lauric Acid, Sodium Isethionate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Potassium Sorbate, Coconut Acid, Laureth-4, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-6, Coumarin.
